part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶[wall]

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spore-rich slime glistens on the cage-like fruiting body, trimmed like a hedge to conform with the ordered angles of domesticity.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Rock is eroded to sand, sand is blown into lakes, lakes are buried in mud, and mud crushes sand to rock. Earth is rearranged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Invertebrate life was sucked of its tissue and bled still over millions of years. The glaucous rock is a necropolis.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Lacustrine ecosystems, cast in lime-rich mud, put their million-year-old affairs on display in chalk-white shine.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Carmine clouds assume their crystal habit: cubes nested inside and out. Why does Moghra'yi conceal this form from the sun?

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Burnt crystal gold tosses its geometric shadows onto the floors of a million watery grottos.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black stone stands in monument to the cities of snails that perished under clay and rotted into pyrite.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Reefs were the arcologies of the young oceans. Now they are turquoise crypts, their surfaces bitten by acid water into rough wounds.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stony eggs are incubated in pearly planar sheets. No larvae ever hatch; they're abraded into dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Unnamed to the beings of the surface world are the birthing atria of the subterrane, where ultramafic rock is wetted in amniotic fluid and birthed as a world-serpent.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Volcanic dust pupated in its deep-earth cocoon and cracked free as grey stone. Sophists theorize it's the color of pure aether.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Dappled crystal mosaics of red and cyan are the metamorphic remnants of crumbling world-plates. The new earth struggles to be born.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Snails and coral were crushed on the geologic press, painted into ribbons of impurity, and polished along the ideal plane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Outworld hard-shelled beings were harvested from planetesimals, burned bright in the magenta exhaust of their scavengers' ships, and crushed together in astral slingshot to reentry.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶World-voids in the nethermost reaches of the planet are partitioned by numinous masonry. There is meaning in the patterns of its faint white filigree, but it's discerned by no one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶World-voids in the nethermost reaches of the planet are partitioned by numinous masonry. There is meaning in the patterns of its faint white filigree, but it's discerned by no one.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Feldspar and its cousin rocks are composited and pocked with static-pattern grain. Cracks foreshadow the pebbles of the future.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Braids of fibrous plant veins enmesh compacted mud and weep a brackish blood.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The scars of lava flow are legible as little ledges across the wide stone. The small darkling holes were once the birth craters of dissolved gases.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Time and chance -- the two hands of nature -- have woven roots, stems, and leaves into a fibrous dam.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining black ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining gold ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining red ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining purple ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining blue ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining green ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years. The whole stone is cut across by shining green and gold ribbons.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Islands of carbon gravel populate an ocean of bitumen and rise from the horizontal plane toward the emptiness of the air-rasp. Time and pressure have laid hair-line trenches along the basin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black islands of carbon gravel populate an ocean of bitumen and rise from the horizontal plane toward the emptiness of the air-rasp. Time and pressure have laid hair-line trenches along the basin.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sheet metal is locked in diamond pattern and welded to enclose. The surface is scorched and scratched in sections.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sheet metal is locked in diamond pattern and welded to enclose. The surface is scorched and scratched in sections.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Longwise infill plates of burnished crysteel are girdered by fulcrete beams. Life sounds echo through their empty spaces.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The cracks in the wall are fossils of the compressed foamcrete's hexagonal expansion pattern.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The poison aqua moss brightens the metal form and attracts brass-drunk bugs.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Smooth grey stone hides its bonded pebbly innards and cement blood-paste. It's streaked with dirt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A cut of pink and fuzzy flesh has been stretched and tanned to roof its wards.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tree bark was burnt black by skyfire assault and now gleams in the after light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The quickened flax of the earth was duck-weaved in a simple square pattern and hung up on pickets.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stripes of watervine and brinestalk straw are batched and angled to divert salt slag.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud. Hung against them, from a quartet of nails, is a frayed mothwing mask; its delicate leaves of rust-plaster are crocheted with nanoweave and stretched across an armature of stiff wire. Where eyes once peered and a mouth breathed, resin now fills the gaps.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Burnt clay ingots are laid crosswise, and a barrier is made. Each brick is marred by the variegated cuts of time, imperfections in the heat balance of the oven it was fired in, and fungi in its birthing mud.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Fluted columns of prism glass scatter the sight of becoming into a thousand fractured vistas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Vacuum tubes slice through circuit topography like rivers on a fold belt. Hot gas heaves through and suffuses its brass and silicone acres in a red glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Vacuum tubes slice through circuit topography like rivers on a fold belt. Cold gas heaves through and suffuses its brass and silicone acres in a cyan glow.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Vacuum tubes slice through circuit topography like rivers on a fold belt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sand was crush-fired and molded into lucent panes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sand was crush-fired, pigmented, and molded into smokey panes.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cerulean light from inside the Spindle channel glimmers across the pane like stars on a galactic disc or diodes on a circuitboard. The light breathes godliness into the glass.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cyan bursts through a glassy hull and looks as though the sky was crystallized into a thicket of hexagonal prisms. The Eaters dug it up from its magmatic birthsite and arranged it into mounds to enshrine the Spindle.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Here are several stripped trunks of sallow brinestalk bonded with mud and strewn with flower petals.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Several sharpened trunks of sallow brinestalk were driven into the ground here.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Several sharpened trunks of sallow brinestalk were driven into the ground here. The gaps aren't wide enough to squeeze through.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Spirals cross the grain on the dogthorn pickets stuck into the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Pailings of age-nicked iron stand in a row between two horizontal rails.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Salt-tracing waves cross the grain on the brinestalk pickets stuck into the ground.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Glinting light is sculpted in parallax to the illusion of a shale wall: clay and quartz were dried and smashed into the red rock that's been quarried by hillfolk for thousands after thousands of years.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Glinting light is sculpted in parallax to the illusion of a marble wall: snails and coral were crushed on the geologic press, painted into ribbons of impurity, and polished along the ideal plane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Glinting light is sculpted in parallax to the illusion of a sandstone wall: rock is eroded to sand, sand is blown into lakes, lakes are buried in mud, and mud crushes sand to rock. Earth is rearranged.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Glinting light is sculpted in parallax to the illusion of a thatched wall: stripes of watervine and brinestalk straw are batched and angled to divert salt slag.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Old stone worked to waist height to stop spilling but not seeing.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A low wall of solid sandstone.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wisps of steam coil out of vertical vents cut in columns from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wisps of noxious fumes coil out of vertical vents cut in columns from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sparks fly from vertical vents cut in columns from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tiny scratches mark lateral vents cut in rows from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Tiny scratches mark lateral vents cut in rows from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Normality condensate tesselates the vertical vents cut in columns from tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Long dead and blown into particulate by billows of Golden Dawn, dead moss sticks to the vents of tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Long dead and eroded into particulate by magenta showers, dead moldstuff sticks to the vents of tarnished chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Wisps of steam coil out of vertical vents cut in columns from soot-stained chrome.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Freezing mist coils out of lateral vents cut into the chrome wainscotting of a marble pillar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Cold dew dresses the lateral vents cut into the chrome wainscotting of a marble pillar.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Potential is polarized into a cyanic hex mesh and keyed to its arranger. Objects of sufficient mass are blocked, but small ones fired leeward can pass through.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Potential is polarized into a scarlet hex mesh and keyed to its arranger. Objects are blocked unless they are molecularly whitelisted.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A blurry flim cordons off a wedge of spacetime with so much quantum friction that its inhabitants are ground to a halt.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶This is an exquisitely detailed high relief cut from precious cerulean marble. It depicts the Sacred Joining, as recounted by Shekhinah the Father to the temple high priests. In the early dawn of our universe, the Argent Fathers roamed the timeless aether with inert hearts. There, in the coldest distance of space, they discovered beauty-and-chrome incarnate, the Kasaphescence. Together they wrought machines from Her naked womb to inhabit a hundred earths. In the scene here, the Fathers first approach Her Radiance. They are led by Shekhinah, who occupies a position of prominence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶This is a high relief cut with exquisite detail from rare, cerulean marble. It depicts the Edification, as chanted in the Canticles Chromaic. After the Sacred Joining, the Argent Fathers molded the plasmatic metal of the Kasaphescence into edifices fit for inhabitance by mortal folk. They wrought spires onto mountains and arches over rivers. Here, Shekhinah oversees the construction, gazing east upon His new, gleaming world.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Fulcrete dyed with integral pigments bursts into mottled color. It's been incised with regular geometry that draws the eye across the horizontal plane.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Bone-shapes of the human form are disarranged to tessellate properly. Round skulls require ulna knots to fill the gaps in their sequences. The boundaries of this world are rice-white and filled with presence.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Whole worlds are carved in bas relief, simulacra of the motley lives of ash-dreaming Eaters. Palm leaves lift pyramids into the star-ribboned sky, and the water of life pours over the lip of an oinochoe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Whole worlds are threaded in three-dimensional filigree, simulacra of the motley lives of ash-dreaming Eaters. Palm leaves lift pyramids into the star-ribboned sky, and the water of life pours over the lip of an oinochoe.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶sultan_wall

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶sultan_wall

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:1=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:2=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:3=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:4=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:5=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶carved stone from the sultanate of Resheph

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of Resheph. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Gigantic, old stone was stacked, knapped, and carved in long arcs to the style of the day in the time of =sultan:5=. Since then, the project has accrued collaborators, and their signatures are writ everywhere: here, the lacuna of a vandal's edit; there, the soft strokes of time's brush.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Precious stone was dragged from the reaches of the dreaming earth, stacked in cyclopean designs, and carved to the splendor of a thousand blooming florets. Moistureless air preserves the gilding, but time has softed its edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Precious stone was dragged from the reaches of the dreaming earth, stacked in cyclopean designs, and carved to the splendor of a thousand blooming florets. Moistureless air preserves the gilding, but time has softed its edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Precious stone was dragged from the reaches of the dreaming earth, stacked in cyclopean designs, and carved to the splendor of a thousand blooming florets. Moistureless air preserves the gilding, but time has softed its edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Precious stone was dragged from the reaches of the dreaming earth, stacked in cyclopean designs, and carved to the splendor of a thousand blooming florets. Moistureless air preserves the gilding, but time has softed its edges.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Precious stone was dragged from the reaches of the dreaming earth, stacked in cyclopean designs, and carved to the splendor of a thousand blooming florets. Moistureless air preserves the gilding, but time has softed its edges.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶gilded marble from the sultanate of Resheph

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Drapery flows are frozen in marble around a rondure in high relief. The gilded walls of imperium are baroque, but they're still more modest than the gilding of the earlier sultans.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶sultan_wall

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stone quarried from the early earth binds the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stone quarried from the early earth divides the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Stone quarried from the early earth binds the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black marble quarried from the early earth binds the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black marble quarried from the early earth divides the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black marble quarried from the early earth binds the art of a life.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Black marble was rasped into a vaulted canvas of emptiness, and then left, inspiring wonder at what could have been.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A moist tissue lining stretches over electrofired clay and soldered metal plates. Underneath a translucent film, grids of undercircuitry blink their golden light.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A voluminous storage cabinet is worked into the geologic rib cage. Magnet-suspended shelves divide the space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A voluminous storage cabinet is worked into the metallic rib cage. Magnet-suspended shelves divide the space.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mountainous streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed with dried death sludge.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mountainous streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed with furcate nerves.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mountainous streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed with solidified star gas.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶layer of resin extruded by Qas and Qon

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mountainous streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed at right angles with solidified dream gas.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Mountainous streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed with shale chips and dust.

part.Name: Render
part.DisplayName: ▶layer of resin extruded by Shug'ruith spawn

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Sloping streamers of oily shellac are moulded to floor contours and trace a star orchid path. The whole section is glazed with shale chips and dust.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Irregular volumes of stone are heaped together. Across its surface, points of order poke sporadically through the pile of entropy: a statue's finger, the gnomon of a sundial, a parcel of circuitboard.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶It's a secretion of sticky palm-juice that has cooled into a big block.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶A quantum mess cooled and arranged itself as a towering hexagon. Bubbles of earth gas and other quirks of time are frozen in the quartz-amber, and existence is chipped off the lathe of nothingness by moonlight.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Moss hems the little moonlit faces of speed-grown quartz. When entropy obliterates order, it reassembles at smaller scales.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Quartzstuff in the radial habit crusts over a layer of softstone, and beneath that, a layer of dead crystal dripping in static resin and singing with psychic promise.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Little crystal shoots were crushed by pure ego-weight to a girthful, stout, and equant tranducer of transient thoughtsoft. Decohered emotion and memory crystallize as they shoot up the root.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶The shining surface of quickchrome swims in shifting refraction patterns. As its light is focused, glyphs begin to appear.

part.Name: Chat
part.Says: ▶SPECIMEN: SAAD AMUS, THE SKY-BEAR, CHAMPION OF SALUM

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Magnetic tape is spooled around a wheel and fed to a drive head that scribes and scries, stamping data out of the third dimension then quickening it back in.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Across a field of brass and chrome diodes blink in gyres.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Scanlines paint the lune in cathode amber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Springfoam keys push back against fingers in the course of flirtatious coupling between machine and folk.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Scanlines paint the lune in cathode amber.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: ▶Across a field of brass and chrome diodes blink in gyres.
